transcript: It was when we were driving past that, you know, that nicker-bocker-licker-locker, and you would say, no, you said, let's get some champagne. And I said, no, times of wasting or something like that. That's what it is, right?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: It was when we were driving passed that knickerbocker liquor locker and you would said, no you said "let's get some champagne" and I said "no time to wasting" or something like that.  That's what it is, right?
